message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you today. I think it would be incredibly useful for you. I'm asking for $14,000 to start. What do you think?
I'm really interested in the product, but $14,000 is a bit out of my budget. I'd be willing to pay $10,000 for it. Can you meet me at this price?
I appreciate your interest, Bob.  While I'm willing to negotiate, $10,000 is quite a bit lower than I'm comfortable with. Could you do $12,500?
I'm still really interested in the product, but $12,500 is still a bit out of my budget. I'd be willing to pay $11,000 for it. Can you meet me at this price?
